description:
Check out http://www.pgconf.us/2015/event/81/ for the full talk details.

PgQ provides an extremely convenient mechanism for Postgres developers to efficiently create durable, transactional messages for asynchronous processing. In this talk, we discuss in detail how to effectively use PgQ to power event-driven systems in your infrastructure.

About the Speaker
Dave is a developer at Braintree in Chicago, where he has worked on a variety of products since 2011. He particularly enjoys working with Postgres and other data-oriented systems.

title: Event-driven systems with Postgres and PgQ
